title.narrative: Environmentally Sound Management of Products and Wastes Containing POPs and Risks Associated with Their Final Disposal

description.narrative: 1: Develop institutional capacities and strengthen the regulatory and policy framework to address emerging POPs issues, 2: Management and disposal in an environmentally sound manner, of POPs pesticides, PCBs and newly listed POPs, 3: Reduction of UPOPs releases from priority sources, 4: Awareness raising, capture lessons-learned, disseminated experiences, monitor project progress and provide adaptive feedback and evaluation,Project Management Cost (PMC)

participating-org.narrative: The Ministry of Energy, Natural Resources, the Environment and Mines (SERNA)
